attributes.action: I want the government to introduce an antibody test for unvaccinated people
attributes.additional_details: Natural immunity is more powerful than vaccinated immunity this is a scientific fact this needs to be a mandatory test before vaccination as there is studies that say it’s dangerous to overload the body with antibodies from vaccine and natural immunity
attributes.background: I want the government to include natural immune people with anti bodies to be treated like vaccinated people for travel purposes and status
